attributes.action: `LAW` TO STOP COMPANIES CHANGING NAMES TO AVOID THERE LIABILITIES
attributes.additional_details:
WE THE UNDERSIGNED WANT THE CONTROL ON COMPANIES WITH LOOPHOLES PLUGGED TO STOP THE BAD USING `NAME CHANGES` TO AVOID THERE LIABILITIES, THIS WOULD SAFE GUARD THE PUBLIC WHO AT THIS TIME GO TO THE LOSS IF THERE ARE ISSUES AND ANY MONEY OWED TO OTHER COMPANIES AS WELL, MANY PEOPLE AND OTHER COMPANIES GO TO THE LOSS OF MANY THOUSANDS OF POUNDS EACH YEAR BY THIS BAD PRACTICE, PLEASE PLUG THIS ASAP AND ALSO STOP THE SAME  DIRECTORS FROM GOING FROM ONE COMPANY TO ANOTHER FOR SO MANY YEARS, `ALL` COMPANIES MUST LIKE THE PUBLIC HAVE TO, AND THAT IS `PAY THERE DEBTS` THIS SHOULD BE COMMON SENSE IN LAW.

IF YOU HAVE BEEN A SUBJECT OF THE ABOVE ISSUES PLEASE SIGN.
